name_product: Eyelash extensions: Black LASHY - 16 lines - MIX
description: Bends B, C, D, L, M           6 and 16 linesThe stickiness of the eyelashes tape plays a decisive role when choosing a brand of eyelashes.50% of lashmakers work in tape-in eyelash extension technology.Lashy eyelashes have an average stickiness of the tape, which is convenient for tape-in technology, because fans are easily formed and don't break. Also such stickiness of the tape is convenient for manual lashmakers , because the adhesive layer does not remain on the base of the eyelash and does not interfere with the forming of the fan.Convenient marking of the tape by thickness, length and bend - the lashmaker will not get confused using several bends and thicknesses in one job. Lashy eyelashes have a rich black color and a glossy surface.MIX palettes are formed in such a way that all the necessary lengths are collected in one palette, and each other mix continues the previous one, so the lashmaker does not have unclaimed lengths. This palette is also convenient to get acquainted with the brand (4-9, 5-10, 7-12, 9-12, 10-15)The cost of the palette is cost-effective for the master, which increases the profitability of the procedure.

Reliably fixes eyelashes for the lash lifting procedure.Apply with reusable silicone rollers for curling and lash lamination.Glue quickly gets dry and fixes the eyelashes.How to use: apply the adhesive to the rollers with a brush to fix eyelashes on them.Store in a cool dark place out of the reach of children.The shelf life of the product is 12 months from the producing moment.Expiration date after opening: 3 monthsRecommended for advanced lash artists only.

The professional product for cleansing the face and eyelashes. Soft foam-mousse effectively and delicately removes the remains of cosmetics and surface contaminants. Suitable for daily use.Store at temperature : 5-30’ C in dry place, avoid direct exposure to sunlight.Best before : 36 months Shelf life after opening the package: 6 monthsIt has soothing, restorative and regenerative properties.Without parabens and oils.It recommended for sensitive skin.Economical in use.Foam-mousse is presented in two refreshing fragrances: aloe and green tea.The shelf life of the product is 2,5 years from the producing moment.Expiration date after opening: 6 monthsVolume: 50 ml.

Envelops the eyelashes, minimizes adverse external effects.Extends the time of lash wearing.It should be applied to the lashes immediately after the procedure by a lash extension stylist.Lacquered coating for eyelashes has a very strong fixation.The coating should be applied only on the gluing surface of the natural lash and artificial one.For professional use only.The shelf life of the product is 2 years from the producing moment.Expiration date after opening: 6 months.

It covers the eyelashes with the invisible layer, by protecting against external effects.Designed for long wearing and better connection of the natural lashes with artificial.  Coating should be applied after the eyelash extension procedure 2-3 times a week.Suitable for the both lash extensions types: classic and volume.Nutritious coating «Gently» does not stick the lashes.Recommended for homecare treatment.The shelf life of the product is 2 years from the producing moment.Expiration date after opening: 6 months.

name_product: Black coating Lovely with the effect of toning, 10 ml
description: Covers the lashes with a thin layer, contributes to the long lash wearing, and supports the natural eyelashes regrowth.Designed for longer wearing and better connection of natural lashes with artificial.It has nutritional value and gives strength to the natural lashes.The coating should be applied onto the lash base 2-3 times a week.Black coating for eyelashes is suitable for use in both types of eyelash extensions: classic and volume.The black coating does not stick the lashes.Ideal as homecare treatmentThe shelf life of the product is 2 years from the producing moment.Expiration date after opening: 6 months.

A multifunctional tool is useful in a lash lifting procedure.It has several advantages:it fits easily in hand, what allows not to strain the brush;a curved needle  spreads eyelashes on the roller quickly;a round handle and a short, thin nose enables comfortably work even in the inner corner of the eye;the brush at the end of the instrument helps to remove glue in end of the procedure conveniently;By using one tool instead of several, procedure time will be saved. The needle is made of high-quality stainless steel.Easy to clean

Eyelashes from "Deluxe" series are distinguished by the special fiber formula that makes the lashes ultra-soft and very flexible.The eyelashes start narrowing from 2/3 of their length.All the eyelashes of the Deluxe series are well pigmented from the base to its tip, have a beautiful matte black color, and perfectly hold their shape while wearing.The total number of lashes in a palette varies from 4 300 to 12 000 eyelashes, depending on their thickness.Lashes are available in 16 lines palettes.
